DeathMessage.Message: New school, same janitor.
Don't shake the tree if the bees are gonna kill you.
Danner wants flowers or a cadaver. He's not picky.
Dr. Danner is serious when he says to get out of his classroom.
Puddles are slippery.
Monty is pretty bitter about being left upstairs. Don't get too close to him and he'll leave you alone.
You should use your time a bit better.
Ozzy can get back up with a vengeance after using his inhaler.
Angry bees are bad for your health.
The plant creature wants the flowers in a different order.
It may be a fresh Nugget Cave, but it's just as deep as the last one.
You should bring something to hit the ball back with.
Get out of Buggs's line of sight if you want to keep your head.
Don't get in Nugget's way.
No moving or talking in study hall. Now would be a good time to eat an apple.
Dr. Danner is in the bathroom. You shouldn't go there.
You should get back outside before the bell rings.
Get back in the classroom before the lights come back on.
Find a way to distract Penny before she realizes the locker is being broken into.
Don't let anyone kick Monty off of the chemistry set.
That was the wrong thing to mix with.
The creature will kill you if he isn't distracted by something.
Don't get too close to the creature.
Jerome might be a little mad that you helped kill his father.
Don't wait until Penny is approaching to leave the car on the stairs.
You should press a button that sends Penny away from you.
Don't go inside unless the lunch lady has been removed.
You'll have to save Lily immediately after killing the first monster.
Save Billy after saving Lily.
Eliminate the principal before the cannon fires.
Don't let the monster suck you up. Use the robotic claws to stop her.
Use the claws to force the monster to look up at Nugget when he comes down.
Don't stick forks in the electrical outlet. This applies to real life too.
That was the wrong order.
Penny will shoot everyone in the head if she isn't distracted. Maybe something from earlier will help?
Don't wait around if you decide to help the janitor.
He really wants that key before lunch starts.
You're an accomplice. Go upstairs and help the geezer out.
You should get back to your spot in study hall before Dr. Danner finds you.
Students aren't allowed in the teacher's lounge.
Those bodies need to be taken care of or else one of you is going to prison.
You should help the janitor finish up with those bodies.
If Penny finds the contraband by the tree, you're on the hook for it.
Use the toilet paper to distract the janitor before dealing with Cindy.
Getting caught out of study hall is a great way to get sent to the principal's office.
Get the knife before you get close to Applegate.
You should do what Billy says as long as you're holding a listening device.
Don't get caught with the remote. Get it to Lily and Billy before Penny completes her scan.
It's not safe to stay in the janitor's closet too long.
The principal is waiting for you downstairs. It's best to sneak out the way you came in.
Nugget's in a better situation than you right now.
You should have delivered the declaration.
Find a way to escape the bathroom. Your screwdriver could help.
Don't get sent to the principal's office.
If Billy draws the lunch lady's attention, you're all in trouble.
Penny will find you if you have contraband on you when the bell rings.
It's probably best if you just don't go upstairs.
Don't stick around outside. Get inside before the bell rings.
Don't get caught in study hall if you don't have study hall.
Sneak in through the principal's office to avoid getting caught.
Get out of the bathroom before the janitor notices you've clogged the toilet.
Make sure Monty gets his elevator key back.
Kill the creature that's looking at you before doing anything else.
Make sure all of the creatures are dead before going for the principal.
It's probably best if you don't show up at all, if you don't have the hair samples.
Don't go back out there.
It's not a good idea to crush an active explosive device.
Wrong button.
